interpretation: The hippopotamus emoji represents strength, power, and protection. This card suggests that you have the ability to protect yourself and those you care about. You may need to stand up for yourself or assert your boundaries in a situation. Alternatively, this card can indicate a need to be more mindful of your own strength and power, and to use it wisely. The hippopotamus also symbolizes the importance of staying grounded and connected to your instincts. Trust your intuition and listen to your gut feelings. This card can also indicate the need to take care of yourself physically, whether that means getting enough rest or taking steps to improve your health. Overall, the hippopotamus reminds you that you are capable of great things, and that you have the strength and resilience to overcome any challenge.
